channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Off-price retailer Ross flashes another sign that consumers are seeking discounts this fall
item.description: Ross Stores joins TJ Maxx parent in seeing consumers flock to their discounted merchandise.

item.title: Tennis star Naomi Osaka sells SoCal home back to Nick and Vanessa Lachey in savvy $7.9 million deal
item.description: Osaka sold the Tarzana, Calif., estate back to reality TV host couple Nick and Vanessa Lachey for $7.9 million—just 3 years after buying it from them ...

item.title: ‘I’ve been kept in poverty’: Do I take a $70K job at 74 and lose my Section 8 housing allowance?
item.description: “After the age of 50, I really only had sporadic contract work and I had to sell my house.”

item.title: I’m single, 75, and living with kidney disease and a pacemaker. I’ve no long-term care insurance. Will I be OK?
item.description: “My income is $120,000 per year which includes $60,000 in Social Security and a pension.”

item.title: Here’s the $863 billion secret Powell, Trump and Bessent aren’t telling us about gold and bitcoin
item.description: The inevitable gold-price reckoning that could fund Trump’s bitcoin ambitions — and sting your bank account.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...
